    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2601</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The skies of the Northern Hemisphere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Himmel der Nordhemisphäre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les cieux de l'hémisphère nordique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os céus do hemisfério do norte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I cieli dell'emisfero nordico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι ουρανοί του βόρειου ημισφαιρίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los cielos del hemisferio norteño</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An interactive animation which demonstrates the night skies in the Northern Hemisphere.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">night sky</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Northern Hemisphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine interaktive Animation, die die Nachthimmel 
in der Nordhemisphäre zeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation interactive qui démontre les cieux
de nuit dans l'hémisphère nordique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation interativo que demonstre os céus da
noite no hemisfério do norte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione interattiva che dimostra i cieli 
di notte nell'emisfero nordico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια διαλογική ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει τους 
ουρανούς νύχτας στο βόρειο ημισφαίριο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación interactiva que demuestra los 
cielos de la noche en el hemisferio norteño.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nachthimmel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nordhemisphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ciel de nuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Hémisphère Nordique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">céu da noite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hemisfério Do norte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cielo di notte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Emisfero Nordico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ουρανός νύχτας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βόρειο ημισφαίριο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cielo de la noche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hemisferio Norteño</string>
          </keyword>
